ud5.3:4.5: anupubbiṁ kathaṁ → ānupubbīkathaṁ (bj); anupubbīkathaṁ (si); anupubbikathaṁ (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ud5.3:4.8: nekkhamme → nekkhamme ca (bj, sya-all); nikkhame ca (pts-vp-pli1)
ud5.3:7.2: acirapakkantaṁ suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ → atha kho suppabuddhaṁ kuṭṭhiṁ acirapakkantaṁ (bj); atha kho suppabuddhaṁ acirapakkantaṁ (si); atha kho suppabuddhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
